name: Pump that Pumpkin!
description:
Pump that Pumpkin is just what you need! In this game, pump up a balloon as fast as possible in one minute. The ballon has the shape of a pumpkin. The title of the game is "Pump that Pumpkin".  You get it, i guess. So get ready to have some pumpkin-pumping fun!

There are 4 stages: 

1: just press space as fast as possible

2. press the up/down arrowkeys.

3. press the correct keyboard key

4. MATH!

Created with the awesome LOVE2D Framework. If someone wants to have a look in the mess of a Game Jame source code, have a peek in the .love file. 

Credits: Programming, "Artwork" and Sounddesign by me.

HTML5 Port done with davidobot\love.js

PS: Dev-Highscore: 15131m. Bring it on!
